amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute printed in House Report 114-49 and numbered 3 was offered as the Republican Study Committee substitute.
amendment.purpose: An amendment in the nature of a substitute No. 3 printed in House Report 114-49 representing the Republican Study Committee to provide for a balanced budget in six years, encourage pro-growth tax reform and to provide for a national defense.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Stutzman amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 132 - 294 (Roll no. 138).

action.text: Amendment (A003) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Stutzman.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Stutzman.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Stutzman amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 132 - 294 (Roll no. 138).
